SHERLOCK HOLMES
THE FIRST THREAD

Before the Legend. There Was the Student.

It is 1874. A professor lies dead behind a locked door. The police call it a suicide. You know better.

In this "Vertical Slice" standalone title, you will master the skills that will one day make you the world's greatest detective. Introduce yourself to the Threshold Deduction System.

WISHLIST ON STEAM VIEW TRAILER

CORE MECHANICS

  • Calculated Combat Trade blows in a visceral boxing system where brains beat brawn. Freeze time to identify weak points.
  • The Mind's Eye Toggle your vision to see the world as data. Visualize bullet trajectories and acoustic echoes in real-time.
  • The Mind Palace Retreat into your own subconscious to reconstruct the crime scene. Simulate the murder until the pieces fit.
